attributes.action: stop the closure of Manchester School of Flying and continue Pilot Training at Manchester International Airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For almost 30 years, Manchester Airport PLC has accommodated Manchester School of Flying (MSF) on their airfield which has allowed hundreds if not thousands of pilots to obtain their Pilot License and more importantly a career in aviation.

Until recently, MSF has announced that Manchester Airport will not renew the flying school’s lease therefore forcing them to exit the airfield by the end March 08.

Please help us approach Manchester Airport for an alternative solution.
